talents.desc: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases your Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second, even during Undying.  You also gain the ability to gather Regeneration Globes while Undying.
talents.name: Reanimation

talents.desc: During Wraith Walk, you take 25% less damage.
talents.name: Hardened Bones

talents.desc: Activate to heal 20% of your maximum life over 6 seconds. Can be used while Undying to revive faster.
talents.name: Ossein Renewal

talents.desc: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 200 (+10 per level) damage.
talents.name: March of the Black King

talents.desc: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
talents.name: Burning Rage

talents.desc: Skeletal Swing heals you for 2% of your maximum Health per target hit, up to 10%. Effective while Undying.
talents.name: Consume Vitality

talents.desc: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.
talents.name: Hardened Shield

talents.desc: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases your Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second, even during Undying.  You also gain the ability to gather Regeneration Globes while Undying.
talents.name: Reanimation

talents.desc: Increases the healing from Drain Hope to 30% of your maximum Health.
talents.name: Willing Vessel

talents.desc: Activate to heal 20% of your maximum life over 6 seconds. Can be used while Undying to revive faster.
talents.name: Ossein Renewal

talents.desc: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 200 (+10 per level) damage.
talents.name: March of the Black King

talents.desc: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the victim's Maximum Health. This damage does not heal you.
talents.name: Crushing Hope

talents.desc: Every second Drain Hope is active, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
talents.name: Unyielding Despair

talents.desc: Your final swing of March of the Black King also applies the base version of Drain Hope to all enemy Heroes in a large area.
talents.name: Death March

talents.desc: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases your Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second, even during Undying.  You also gain the ability to gather Regeneration Globes while Undying.
talents.name: Reanimation

talents.desc: When a nearby Minion dies, you gain 1% of your maximum Health and 5 Mana, even while Undying.
talents.name: Fealty Unto Death

talents.desc: Increases the Movement Speed slow of Skeletal Swing to 60%.
talents.name: Paralyzing Rage
